channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: メタ社は、同社の新しいジェネレーティブAI広告製品を政治広告主が使用することを禁じていると発表した（Katie Paul/Reuters）
item.description:
Katie Paul / Reuters:
Meta says it is barring political advertisers from using its new generative AI advertising products  —  Facebook owner Meta (META.O) is barring political advertisers from using its new generative AI advertising products, a company spokesperson said on Monday, cutting off campaigns' access …

item.title: TikTokは、米国、英国、ドイツ、フランスのクリエイターを対象とした10億ドルのクリエイターファンドが2023年12月16日に終了すると発表、イタリアとスペインのクリエイターは影響を受けない（Mia Sato/The Verge）
item.description:
Mia Sato / The Verge:
TikTok says its $1B creator fund will end on December 16, 2023, for creators in the US, the UK, Germany, and France; creators in Italy and Spain aren't affected  —  TikTok's $1 billion creator fund will come to an end on December 16th, 2023, the company told users today.

item.title: Metaによると、Instagramのクリエイターのアクティブなサブスクリプションは、サブスクリプション機能の開始からわずか1年強で1Mに達し、新しいクリエイターツールを発表した（Jacob Kastrenakes/The Verge）。
item.description:
Jacob Kastrenakes / The Verge:
Meta says there are now 1M active subscriptions to Instagram creators, just over a year after launching the subscriptions feature, and unveils new creator tools  —  There are now 1 million paid subscriptions to creators on Instagram, slowly transforming the platform into a space where creators can get paid directly by their fans.

item.title: YouTube、コメント要約や会話型レコメンドツールなど、Premiumユーザー向けのジェネレーティブAI機能をまずは米Androidでテスト予定（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
YouTube plans to test generative AI features for Premium users, like a comments summarizer and a conversational recommendations tool, first on Android in the US  —  YouTube will begin to experiment with new generative AI features, the company announced today.

item.title: OpenAIがCopyright Shieldを発表、ChatGPT EnterpriseユーザーとOpenAIの顧客で、同社のサービスに関連する著作権侵害の申し立てに直面している人を守ることを約束（Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Kyle Wiggers / TechCrunch:
OpenAI debuts Copyright Shield, promising to defend ChatGPT Enterprise users and OpenAI customers facing copyright infringement claims related to its services  —  OpenAI — bowing to peer pressure — today announced it'll step in and defend businesses using OpenAI products …

item.title: ジェイソン・ワゲンハイムがBDGメディアを退社し、2026年のワールドカップ開催を前に、サッカーサイトを所有するフットボールコ社の北米初のCEOに就任（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Jason Wagenheim leaves BDG Media to become the first North America CEO of Footballco, which owns soccer websites, ahead of the 2026 World Cup on the continent  —  Jason Wagenheim is leaving BDG Media, the parent company of Bustle and a slew of other female-focused lifestyle brands …

item.title: CBS News and StationsがCBS News Confirmedを立ち上げ、クラウディア・ミルンSVP兼スタンダード＆プラクティス部長を中心に、誤報やディープフェイクを調査（Brian Steinberg/Variety）
item.description:
Brian Steinberg / Variety:
CBS News and Stations launches CBS News Confirmed to examine misinformation and deepfakes, led by SVP and Head of Standards and Practices Claudia Milne  —  CBS' news-and-stations division will launch a new unit to examine misinformation and so-called “deepfakes,” or false videos that can often be generated via artificial intelligence.

item.title: ピューリッツァー賞委員会、受賞対象を放送・音声機関が運営するデジタルニュースサイトのジャーナリズム記事にも拡大（Editor and Publisher誌）
item.description:
Editor and Publisher:
The Pulitzer Prize Board expands its awards' eligibility to include written journalism from digital news sites operated by broadcast and audio organizations  —  The Pulitzer Prize Board has decided to expand eligibility for its journalism awards to digital news sites operated by broadcast and audio organizations.

item.title: タイムスタジオ、コンテンツスタジオEverWonder立ち上げのため退社したイアン・オレフィスの後任として、Majordomo Mediaの共同設立者デイブ・オコナーを社長に指名（Matt Grobar/Deadline）
item.description:
Matt Grobar / Deadline:
Time Studios names Majordomo Media co-founder Dave O'Connor as its president, replacing Ian Orefice, who left to launch the content studio EverWonder  —  - Crazy Legs Developing Prince Biopic Based On First Wife Mayte Garcia's Memoir ‘The Most Beautiful’  — Good Deed Entertainment …

item.title: ガネットがテイラー・スウィフト記者にブライアン・ウェストを起用、テネシアン紙のニュースルームを拠点にUSAトゥデイ紙やガネットの地方紙を担当する（Chris Willman/Variety）
item.description:
Chris Willman / Variety:
Gannett appoints Bryan West as its Taylor Swift reporter, who will be working out of the Tennessean's newsroom for USA Today and other Gannett local dailies  —  Gannett, the biggest newspaper chain in the U.S., no longer has a blank space under the title of “Taylor Swift reporter.”

item.title: ディズニー、12月4日付でペプシコ副会長兼CFOのヒュー・ジョンストンを上級執行副社長兼CFOに指名、クリスティン・マッカーシーCFOは2023年6月に退任（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
Disney names PepsiCo vice chairman and CFO Hugh Johnston as its senior executive VP and CFO, starting on December 4; CFO Christine McCarthy left in June 2023  —  The executive has been the CFO of beverage giant PepsiCo, and effectively succeeds Christine McCarthy.  —  The Walt Disney Co. has found its next CFO.

item.title: ソーシャルメディアのスターを取材する人気YouTubeチャンネル「Spill Sesh」の運営者であることを明かした、元TMZスタッフのクリスティ・クックへのインタビュー（Madison Malone Kircher/New York Times）。
item.description:
Madison Malone Kircher / New York Times:
An interview with former TMZ staffer Kristi Cook, who unmasked herself as the person behind popular YouTube channel Spill Sesh, which covers social media stars  —  For years, people have wondered who's behind the popular Spill Sesh channel.  On Friday, the person behind the account unmasked herself.

item.title: 情報源Spotify、ロイヤリティのしきい値を1曲あたり年間1,000ストリームに設定 月収0.05ドル未満のStreamshareの0.5%を廃止も（Tim Ingham/Music Business Worldwide）
item.description:
Tim Ingham / Music Business Worldwide:
Sources: Spotify sets its royalties threshold at 1,000 annual streams per track, which could demonetize 0.5% of its Streamshare that earns less than $0.05/month  —  Last month Music Business Worldwide broke the news that major changes were coming to Spotify's royalty model in Q1 2024.

item.title: ディッシュ・ネットワーク、第3四半期の有料TV契約者純減は6万4,000件、これに対し2022年第3四半期は3万件増加、2022年第3四半期の1,020万件から2023年9月時点では884万件に減少（Georg Szalai/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Georg Szalai / The Hollywood Reporter:
Dish Network reports losing 64K net pay TV subscribers in Q3, vs. adding 30K in Q3 2022, falling from 10.2M subscribers in Q3 2022 to 8.84M as of September 2023  —  The company, led by CEO Erik Carlson and chairman Charlie Ergen, reported its third-quarter results.

item.title: 情報筋は、ハンターブルックの "ニュース・ヘッジファンド "の計画と、その事業がどのように運営され、証券取引法を遵守し、信頼性があるのかについての疑問を詳述している（フィナンシャル・タイムズ紙）。

Financial Times:
Sources detail Hunterbrook's plans for a “news hedge fund” and questions about how the business would operate, comply with securities law, and have credibility  —  ‘Narrow needle to be threaded’ as start-up combines journalism with trading house
